:::{#hero-heading}

Jun is a Ph.D. candidate at Universidad Carlos III de Madrid (UC3M) . Prior to entering the Ph.D. program at UC3M, Jun attended the Banking University of HCMC, Vietnam, where she got a double degree in Business Administration and Accounting. Jun also finished her Master of Business and Finance with an emphasis in accounting and auditing. Upon graduation, Jun worked in the public accounting profession at Mazars Vietnam and BIDV Vietnam for three years as an audit intern and a general accountant.
